universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Class Widget.BackgroundTintInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.Widget.TintInfo
      • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.Widget.BackgroundTintInfo
  • Enclosing interface:
    Widget

    public static class Widget.BackgroundTintInfo
extends Widget.TintInfo
    This class holds base data necessary to tint components and background of a particular widget.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ColorStateList backgroundTintList
      Color state list used to tint a specific states of a background drawable of the associated widget.
      PorterDuff.Mode backgroundTintMode
      Blending mode used to apply tint to a background drawable of the associated widget.
      boolean hasBackgroundTinMode
      Flag indicating whether the backgroundTintMode has been set or not.
      boolean hasBackgroundTintList
      Flag indicating whether the backgroundTintList has been set or not.
